attributes.action: Disavow any support for prohibition of so called energy inefficient goods, or other infringements on personal freedom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plans been unveiled by the Tories designed to prohibit the sale and ownership of plasma televisions, features that include standby modes, coupled with proposed intrusive inspections of peoples homes for compliance with energy saving measures represent nothing less than a gross infringement of civil liberties.
A government created climate of fear is a devious trick used by governments to persuade citizens to surrender their freedom, it has taken many forms, and it is increasingly taking the form of so called environmental catastrophes.
Most people do not agree with these measures, and they are nothing less than the creation of pressure groups, and an opportunistic elite.
We do not want to see these infringements of civil liberties manifest themselves under a Labour Government, so we would appreciate that your government respect the rights of the individual and disavow support for such measures.
